nodes.text: James was a male Sullustan who was paired up with a companion of similar interests during the Ewok Festival of Love.

During 1 ABY, L-O53 tasked a spacer with finding a loved one for James. After searching the cities of Tyrena and Kaadara during the Festival of Love, the spacer found a companion who shared similar interests with James. James wore a pink shirt with a dark collar and common pants

James was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He was in the game during the Ewok Festival of Love celebration of 2011. During the event, players could pair up James, as well as several other NPC's, with companions who shared similar interests.
